p: Figure 3 and Figure 4 display examples of observed trends in four selected localities for malnutrition, malaria, ARIs and diarrheal diseases, which are among the main reasons for use of health facilities by the population. In Figure 3, malnutrition in Antananarivo has a slightly decreasing trend from the year 2000 to 2014 and malaria in Morondava shows a decreasing trend from January 2000 to December 2009.
